Literature Review: Robo-advice has revolutionized the way households approach financial decision-making, leveraging big data to provide personalized and informed guidance on consumption, saving, investment, and debt management. This literature review examines the features and effects of robo-advice, its distributional implications, and its potential role in increasing the effectiveness of economic policies.
